input_text:
Job Title: Dot Net Developer

Location: Raleigh, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Wipro Limited (NYSE: WIT, BSE: 507685, NSE: WIPRO) is a leading technology services and consulting company focused on building innovative solutions that address clients’ most complex digital transformation needs.

We leverage our holistic portfolio of capabilities in consulting, design, engineering, operations, and emerging technologies to help clients realize their boldest ambitions and build future-ready, sustainable businesses.

A company recognized globally for its comprehensive portfolio of services, strong commitment to sustainability and good corporate citizenship, we have over 250,000 dedicated employees serving clients across 66 countries.

We deliver on the promise of helping our customers, colleagues, and communities thrive in an ever-changing world.

A PROUD HISTORY OF OVER 75 YEARSFY22 REVENUE 10.4 BN USDWE’RE PRESENT IN 66 COUNTRIESOVER 1,400 ACTIVE GLOBAL CLIENTS

Wipro is seeking for Dot Net Developer to join our collaborative team.

Position: Dot Net Developer 

Location: Raleigh, North Carolina

Onsite: 3 days WFO (Mandatory)

Job Description:

Outstanding acumen and understanding of Data Structures, Algorithms and Computer Science fundamentals.Result oriented, dedicated, hardworking and can work on own initiative whilst also working collaboratively and deliver on time with a high level of integrity, sense of urgency, attention to detail and quality standards.

5-7 Years’ Experience With The Following Backend Technologies

Strong OOPS, Design Patterns, .NET and .NET CoreStrong experience with Entity Framework Core, LINQWorking experience on design and implementation of HTTP/RESTful APIsWell versed with Unit and Regression (e2e) Testing frameworks.

3-5 Years’ Experience With The Following UI Technologies

Strong fundamentals on HTML, CSS3, Vanilla JavaScriptReact JS Ecosystem, Web pack.Experience with D3 and Ag-grid.Proficient in Unit and Regression (e2e) Testing FrameworksKnowledge of Reactive Programming paradigm and it’s ecosystem is a plus

PL/SQL Strong hands on with at least 5 years of DB Developer experience

Preferable knowledge & understanding of any document store no SQL DB (Mongo Db, Azure Cosmos etc.)Experience working on automation platform like Control-M to integrate and orchestrate enterprise workflows across different applications, data sources, and systems.Proficient in DevOps processes i.e. CI/CD Pipelines, Configuration management. Knowledge of container orchestration platform based on the Kubernetes orchestrator for enterprise app development.Knowledge of Could concepts (Preferable Azure)Ability to work independently is must.Should have very good communication skills.

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, caste, creed, religion, gender, marital status, age, ethnic and national origin, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, political orientation, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Any complaints or concerns regarding unethical/unfair hiring practices should be directed to our Ombuds Group

NET

Experience Level (if available): None
